trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Vyell appears to be in a state of annoyed bewilderment.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the jittery gleaner.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_TODO_01<tab>Report to Vyell.

TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_000<tab>I'm terribly sorry to bother you, but might I ask a small favor? I just saw the gleaner I'd hired for a job, and he seemed awfully...well, “jittery,” I suppose is the word.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_001<tab>And when I tried to ask him what the matter was, he met my eyes for a moment then bolted out of the room...
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_002<tab>I should like to catalog the items he was meant to bring and get them safely stored, but I refuse to play this ridiculous game of coeurl and mouse.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_003<tab>Would you mind tracking him down for me? The last I saw of him, he was dashing off towards Passemerrant Pasturponics.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_004<tab>Most curious behavior for a gleaner. I do hope he's not unwell...
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>This large pot is clearly of Far Eastern origin.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SERCER04189_000_010<tab>Gah! Gods and scholars, don't sneak up on me like that! Can I help you...?
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SERCER04189_000_011<tab>Ah, my employer sent you, did he? Well, he'll be pleased to know that I was able to purchase all his requested Far Eastern items of cultural significance.

TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SERCER04189_000_012<tab>That pot there was one of them, but I was leery of simply handing it over. I think...I think there's something <var 1A 02 /var>alive<var 1A 01 /var> inside...
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_NAMAZU04189_000_013<tab>(-Voice from the Pot-)You tell me where this is, yes, yes?
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SERCER04189_000_014<tab>There! You heard that, didn't you!? I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> it wasn't my imagination!
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SERCER04189_000_015<tab>You seem a well-traveled sort─what sort of creature might we be dealing with here?
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_A1_000_001<tab>It's a Namazu. Trust me.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_A1_000_002<tab>The sort you shouldn't keep trapped in pots.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_A1_000_003<tab>One which will feed the whole family!

TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_NAMAZU04189_000_016<tab>(-Voice from the Pot-)Oho, you know your Namazu, yes, yes! I crawled into this comfy looking pot for a nice nap, and before I knew it, I was whisked away on an adventure!

TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_NAMAZU04189_000_017<tab>(-Voice from the Pot-)Wait! Before you spill me out, would you mind pouring in a generous splash of water? I couldn't bear for anyone to see me so dried out, no, no!

TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_NAMAZU04189_000_018<tab>(-Voice from the Pot-)Oho, very funny. You are one of those who like to make jests in a serious tone of voice. It...<var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> a jest, yes, yes?

TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_NAMAZU04189_000_019<tab>(-Voice from the Pot-)Well, now that I'm here, I might as well make the most of my misfortune! See the sights, try the food, that sort of thing... Convey my pot to the nearest inn, if you please!

TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SERCER04189_000_020<tab>Seeing as our, uh, “guest” is so eager to stay, the least I can do is sponsor his visit and help fill out the paperwork. Meanwhile, I would appreciate it if you could explain the situation to my employer.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_NAMAZU04189_000_021<tab>(-Voice from the Pot-)When I closed my eyes, I did not expect to wake up in a different country, no, no!
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_SERCER04189_000_022<tab>This may be the oddest thing that has ever happened to me...but please be assured that I will take good care of our unwitting traveler.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_030<tab>Did you catch up with the gleaner? What did he have to say for himself?
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_031<tab>...Are you telling me that Namazu are real!? By the Scholar, I thought the stories of such beings were just that─stories.
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_032<tab>And now we have the chance to speak with one in the flesh! We really must house this visitor here in the Archeion, and record the conversations for posterity!
TEXT_AKTKZA010_04189_VYELL_000_033<tab>...Hm? Oh, yes, here, you've been very helpful. Now, if you don't mind, I have preparations to make!
